Module com.example.softmeth_project3
Package com.example.softmeth_project3

Class MemberDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.example.softmeth_project3.MemberDatabase
public class MemberDatabase extends Object
Stores a growing list of members along with sort functionality based on criteria. Includes constructors, member search, add, and remove functionalities.
Author:
William Chen, Kalrav Pandit

  • Constructor Details

    • MemberDatabase

      public MemberDatabase()
      Default constructor. Initializes a member list of four members with blank members in each entry.

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Member member)
      Finds a member in the member database list; a found member has the same first name, last name, and date of birth.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to search for
      Returns:
      the index of the member in database, or -1 if not found

    • checkForMember

      public int checkForMember(Member member)
      Allows other methods to search for members in the database.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to search for
      Returns:
      the index of the member in database, or -1 if not found

    • getExpiryOfMember

      public int getExpiryOfMember(Member member)
      Gets the expiration status of a member.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to get expiry date for
      Returns:
      some value greater than 0 if expired or less if not; 0 if it expires today

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Expands the mlist array by 4 when called.

    • add

      public boolean add(Member member)
      Adds a member to the database if not already in the database.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to add
      Returns:
      true if successful or false if member is in database already

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Member member)
      Removes a member to the database if already in the database.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to remove
      Returns:
      true if successful or false if member is not in database already

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if this database is empty (contains no members).
      Returns:
      true if empty or false if not

    • sortByName

      private Member[] sortByName()
      Sorts this list by names of members.
      Returns:
      the list of sorted members

    • sortByExpiry

      private Member[] sortByExpiry()
      Sorts this list by expiration date.
      Returns:
      the list of sorted members

    • sortByLocation

      private Member[] sortByLocation()
      Sorts this list by county and zip code.
      Returns:
      the list of sorted members

    • print

      public String print()
      Prints the member list as is.

    • printByCounty

      public String printByCounty()
      Prints the member list sorted by county and zipcode.

    • printByExpirationDate

      public String printByExpirationDate()
      Prints the member list sorted by expiration date.

    • printByName

      public String printByName()
      Prints the member list sorted by last name then first name.

    • printByFees

      public String printByFees()
      Prints the member list sorted by membership fees (least to most expensive).

    • loadMembers

      public String loadMembers()
      Loads the historical members from the corresponding text file into the member database.
      Returns:
      whether this was successful based on if the file was found

    • getList

      public Member[] getList()
      Returns the list of members.
      Returns:
      the member list
